explanation: [0-0] A man in a blue shirt stands by the wall, holding a black clipboard with a white paper clipped on it. On the paper, there is a picture. There are graffiti and text on the wall, including the black word "CASPER".

Then the scene switches to the face of the man in the white sweatpants, who has a disdainful expression on his face and spits out of his mouth. He then lies down by the wall, looking at the words above. The scene then switches to the man in the blue shirt, who fearfully covers his face with his clothes in his hands.
